description: Detect AD credential dumping using impacket secretdump HKTL Author: Samir Bousseaden, wagga. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Possible Impacket SecretDump Remote Activity
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND winlog.event_id:"5145" AND winlog.event_data.ShareName:\\\*\\ADMIN$ AND winlog.event_data.RelativeTargetName:*SYSTEM32\\* AND winlog.event_data.RelativeTargetName:*.tmp*)
